meanings.definition: A group of plant sterols found in various vegetable oils and soy products.
meanings.sent1: Many vegetable oils contain stigmasterols, which are beneficial for health.
meanings.sent2: Soy products are a good source of stigmasterols.
meanings.sent3: The stigmasterols in the vegetable oils were having a party in the salad dressing.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge about stigmasterols bloomed like a flower in the garden of nutrition.
meanings.sent5: The importance of stigmasterols in plant-based foods cannot be overstated.
